about_the_game:
Embark on an adventure in Langort, a roguelite deck-building hack-and-slash, where you are a swashbuckling hero on a quest to defeat the Lich Queen. Fight endless hordes of undead, growing more powerful with every kill. Kill, die, learn, repeat.

Unlock unique abilities


Unlock abilities from magic scrolls you find along the way!
Choose which to pick up and which to leave behind, as you only have 3 ability slots.


Slaughter the undead!

Upgrades, upgrades, upgrades!


Choose from many unlockable upgrade cards to empower your hero. Choose your own game style, be your own hero!

Key Features

  • Deck building with upgrade cards you find along the way
  • Shop to upgrade your favorite cards
  • Unique abilities to choose from in your runs
  • Unique enemies to fight
  • Skill based gameplay

Can you break the Lich’s curse and restore peace to the land?

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2500

Recommended:
  • OS: After 2020
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
